      • sendRequest

        public void sendRequest(java.lang.String event)
        Sends an HTTP GET request to the tracker with the following key/value pairs. Decodes response using Bencoder2.
        Parameters:
        event - Announcement for the tracker. Maps to STARTED, STOPPED, or COMPLETED
